data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Arkhangel‘sk, Russia. Please, stir the 18,469 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arkhangel‘sk, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 708,338 people in the state of Arkhangel'sk who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 102 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Arkhangel‘sk, Russia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Arkhangel‘sk, Russia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Arkhangel'sk, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Khanty people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Arkhangel'sk do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 18,469 believers in Arkhangel'sk to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,243,531 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Arkhangel‘sk, Russia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
